remarks: Sufficient condition for being an associative algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isassad.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` W ) ) $.
isassad.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` W ) ) $.
isassad.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` F ) ) $.
isassad.s $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .s ` W ) ) $.
isassad.t $e |- ( ph -> .X. = ( .r ` W ) ) $.
isassad.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
isassad.2 $e |- ( ph -> W e. Ring ) $.
isassad.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. CRing ) $.
isassad.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( r e. B /\ x e. V /\ y e. V ) ) -> ( ( r .x. x ) .X. y ) = ( r .x. ( x .X. y ) ) ) $.
isassad.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( r e. B /\ x e. V /\ y e. V ) ) -> ( x .X. ( r .x. y ) ) = ( r .x. ( x .X. y ) ) ) $.
isassad $p |- ( ph -> W e. AssAlg ) $.
$d B r x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W r x y $.
$d ph r x y $.
